name: ESCAVE (adventure game)
description:
ESCAVE is a single player, 3D platformer with huge amount of single levels. But on each level you gonna discover a new trap.

Control : Q left | D right | Z jump or hover | S crouch or gravity jump.

Mecanic : Double jump, Jump from wall, Crouch, Hover, and Gravity jump.

Traps (in order) : Spike, Lava, Monster, Crate, Flying - Moving platform, Button and Laser Door, Fix gun turret, Teleporter.

Twitter : Dev' @Below_BS and Compagny @Below__Studio.

Big thanks for downloading my game have fun I wich you a good day.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you need help to download :

1) open "ESCAVE.zip",

2) click on folder  "ESCAVE",

3) open "ESCAVE.exe",

4) It's done have fun !
